articles.title: Canadian men in relegation battle in business end of World Rugby Sevens Series season
articles.description: While Argentina looks to join New Zealand in securing a berth at the 2024 Paris Olympics, the battle at the other end of the HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series standings will add more drama to the penultimate stop of the men's season in France this weeke

articles.title: Pope says Argentina government wanted 'my head' when he was in Buenos Aires
articles.description: As archbishop of Buenos Aires, the then Jorge Mario Bergoglio had an often rocky relationship with the government of Argentina President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, who served in that role from 2007-2015
articles.content:
Pope Francis meets a man wearing a Spiderman costume during the weekly general audience in St. Peter's Square at the Vatican, May 10, 2023.

articles.title: Soccer-'As long as he's happy', Argentina boss unconcerned about Messi moves
articles.description: "The matter does not affect us as a national team as long as he's happy when he joins us and we need him to be happy." Messi, who apologised to PSG and his team mates last week, returned to training on Monday.
articles.content: Argentina's World Cup-winning coach Lionel Scaloni said he does not care where Lionel Messi plays his club football as long as he feels comfortable and happy. Messi's future at Paris Saint Germain has been the subject of much speculation over the las... [1401 chars]

articles.title: 'As long as he's happy', Argentina boss unconcerned about Messi moves
articles.description: Argentina's World Cup-winning coach Lionel Scaloni said he does not care where Lionel Messi plays his club football as long as he feels comfortable and happy.
articles.content:
May 10 (Reuters) - Argentina's World Cup-winning coach Lionel Scaloni said he does not care where Lionel Messi plays his club football as long as he feels comfortable and happy.
